job_history.work_description: Received inbound emails from clients as initial point of contact to answer questions related to HR policies, practices or to resolve issues. Helped the client by answering their inquiry, resolving their issue or routing their email to a caseworker for resolution. Recorded and tracked the client issue via the case management tool from initiation to resolution. Maintained records of customer interactions and transactions by documenting details of inquiries, complaints, and comments as well as actions taken.

Maintained records of customer interactions and transactions by documenting details of inquiries, complaints, and comments, as well as actions taken. Developed and implemented filing and delivery methods for FMLA and Short Term Disability documentation to respective global clientele. Facilitated communication for the Absence Management Team to clients and internal departmental teams. Organized and maintained payroll and people services database management system. Communicated to clients and internal/external departmental teams mitigated risks and resolutions regarding policy, transactions and other queries

Answered and Dispatched calls for Medical and Professional clients in the San Antonio and surrounding areas. Provided call monitoring to ensure staff was adhering to quality call control. Maintained On Call books for various medical staff to ensure that the correct staff was contacted during after hours and weekends.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in customer-facing roles, including HR Specialist and Customer Service Representative, demonstrating expert-level mastery in handling customer inquiries, resolving issues, and maintaining records of interactions.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Consistently demonstrated strong communication skills in various roles, including facilitating communication between teams, clients, and internal departments, indicating expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Held a supervisory role as a Call Centre Shift Supervisor, showing a solid level of proficiency in leadership and team management.

skills.name: Data Management
skills.explanation: Maintained records and databases in various roles, including payroll and people services database management, indicating a solid working proficiency in data management.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Consistently demonstrated problem-solving skills in resolving customer issues, mitigating risks, and finding resolutions, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Effectively managed time and prioritized tasks in various roles, including maintaining on-call books and dispatching calls, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: HR Policies
skills.explanation: Demonstrated knowledge of HR policies and practices in the HR Specialist role, indicating a solid working proficiency.
